Penetanguishene is the full name, although you will never hear anyone use it, Penetang is common.  
Penetang sits on the south end of Georgian Bay, part of Lake Huron.
The best way to get to Penetang is by car. From

, Ontario. Continue north from Barrie to Hwy 93 (Exit #121), Penetang is about 20 north on Hwy 93 (45 km)

PMCL (Penetang-Midland Coach Lines) and Greyhound both offer bus services from Toronto and Barrie.
